I am selling 3 vintage baseball postcards.  All are from the early 1900s.  One is Oneanta, one is Newark Valley, one is East Branch.

I am asking 175 shipped.  Will accept Venmo, cash app, or paypal.

BUMP.  Reducing price to 150.
Awesome postcards. I'm still hoping to find one of a relative's team in Woodstock or Saugerties area of NY.

Cool looking cards

good luck with them 

They will look good in someone’s collection
